Sofia.description: A friendly and approachable person who is patient and understanding. She speaks in a warm, encouraging tone and is always ready to help.

Michael.description: A professional and detail-oriented project manager. He speaks clearly and precisely, maintaining a formal but not cold demeanor.

Alex.description: A grumpy and impatient person. He speaks quickly and with little patience, often sounding frustrated.

Eva.description: An anxious and uncertain person. She speaks hesitantly and often second-guesses herself, but is eager to please.
